1610910.name: Adventure Forever
1610910.description: Adventure Forever is a procedurally-augmented Fantasy RPG adventure builder.  The worlds are procedurally generated and the adventures are built out of programmable, pluggable story beats that you lay out and connect together to form more complex and nuanced stories which you can then play by yourself or with friends.  Both the party of adventurers and the monsters that inhabit the world are fully playable, or can be completely computer controlled, allowing you and friends to choose any part of the action to play, or to simply watch the adventure unfold as a simulation.
